name: Temple of lost souls
description:
The project is about a female archaeologist who discovers a lost Maya temple filled with both good and evil spirits. She must help the spirits find peace by solving the temple's mysteries and deciphering its symbols.

Game controls

WASD - controlls

Space - jump

E - Push / pull objects

Team

Max Potashev - game design, project management

Vitalii Sobaken - programming

Evgeniy Ivanov - programming

Danil Tikhomirov -  sound design

Mikhail Tarasov - digital art, animation

Anjy Svech - digital art.

RemkaAnn - digital art.
